items.title: California’s Gerrymandering Scam Raises Election Integrity Concerns
items.description: Voters have complained about problems with mail-in ballots ahead of the Golden State's referendum on Proposition 50.

items.title: Trump Is The Best Statesman Of Our Time Because He’s A Realist
items.description: If we are to properly set the conditions for a civilizational rebirth, we must accept that realistic rhetoric is the statecraft needed for renewal.

items.title: The Biggest Obstacle To Trump’s Israel-Hamas Peace Deal Is Jihadi Ideology
items.description: Despite a new plan, the president’s ultimate ambitions could be threatened by the many challenges inherent to the Gaza conflict.

items.title: The Latest FBI Spying Makes Watergate Look Trivial
items.description: The FBI secretly monitored the phone records of eight sitting Republican senators in an abusive fishing expedition done with impunity.

items.title: China Escalates Cyberattacks That Are Increasingly Hard To Detect
items.description: The Trump administration must take decisive action to hold the Chinese government and its affiliated hackers accountable for their cyber activities.
